original: Bexell, Carl Bernhard Johannes, stadskomminister, Kalmar, f. 28/6/97 i Tolg, Kronob. 1., av kyrkoh. Fingal B. o. Thyra Rydberg. G. 1. 31 m. Ingegerd Hultquist,^ d. 35; 2. 43 m. fil. mag. Martha Björkman. Barn: Margareta f. 32, Peter 45, Oibf 47. — Stud:ex. 18, teod. kand. i Lund 24, prästv. f. Växjö stift 24. V. kommin. i Näsisjö 24-29, dito i Sofia förs. i Jönköp. 29, domkyrkosyssiom. i Växjö 30, pred. v, Växjö istads’ för-sörjn :inrättn. 30-31, v. Kronob. k sa-nat. 30-31, vik. ’lärov:adj. i Växjö 31, domkyrkoadj. i Kalmar 31-39, pred. v. centr:las. där 31, tjg. domkyrkoisyss-lom. i Kalmar sed. 32, vik. ilektor v. folk-sk :’sem. 35, stadskommin. i Kalmar sed. 40, för sv : omr : pas tor 40-42. Se kr. i Växjö stifts miss :råd ’Sed. 45, ’led. av Kalmar ’Stads folksk :’styr. o. av styr. f. Dahmska iSlift. Stensberg. President i Kalmar rotarykl. 46-47. Skr.: ilitt :anmäln., ledande o. biograf, art. i Kalmartidn. Barometern, homi-let. art. i fl. böcker o. tidskr.
translated: Bexell, Carl Bernhard Johannes, city minister, Kalmar, born June 28, 1897, in Tolg, Kronoberg County, son of vicar Fingal B. and Thyra Rydberg. Married 1st in 1931 to Ingegerd Hultquist, who died in 1935; 2nd in 1943 to philosophy student Martha Björkman. Children: Margareta (born) 1932, Peter (born) 1945, Olaf (born) 1947. He graduated from high school in 1918 and obtained a theology degree from Lund University in 1924. He was ordained as a priest for Växjö diocese in 1924. He worked as a deputy vicar in Nässjö from 1924 to 1929, and then in Sofia parish in Jönköping from 1929. He served as a cathedral curate in Växjö in 1930, a preacher at the Växjö city institution for the poor in 1930-1931, assistant vicar of the Kronoberg county prison in 1930-1931, substitute teacher in Växjö in 1931, cathedral curate in Kalmar from 1931 to 1939, preacher at the central hospital there in 1931, temporary lecturer at the folk high school in 1935, city minister in Kalmar from 1940, and pastor for the Swedish area in 1940-1942. He was a member of Växjö diocese's mission council since 1945, a member of Kalmar's municipal primary school board and the board of the Dahmska Foundation in Sliftensberg. He was president of the Kalmar rotary club in 1946-1947. He has written literary reviews, leading articles, and biographies for the Kalmar Times and sermons for various books and magazines.

worksFor.name: Växjö city institution for the poor
